item.title: Create and host a personal blog with Hugo and GitHub Pages
item.description: I have always wanted to create a blog to record my thoughts and notes, but I didn’t want to spend a lot of time setting up all kinds of stuff. After some research on what options I had, I found Hugo and GitHub Pages to be the right choices for me to create this blog. By creating this blog, I learned how to use the Hugo and the Git command line.
